name: part_004
file: tmp_【#ブラちょこ】Black choco Christmas！5周年３DLIVE！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [YjTnRIIczcE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Halloween Night Party'.
Short transition with a black screen and a new song title card.
Performance of the song 'Mrs. Pumpkin no Kokkaku na Yume' with La+ Darknesss joining.
scenes.song_name: Mrs. Pumpkin no Kokkaku na Yume

subtitles.original: ...la la la la la...
subtitles.english: ...la la la la la...

subtitles.original: Jack-o'-Lantern
subtitles.english: Jack-o'-Lantern

subtitles.original: 術中は 私達も 複雑な処がまだ痛いの
subtitles.english: During the procedure, even we still feel pain in complex places.

subtitles.original: パッパと 生にいつも 取り込められていた
subtitles.english: Quickly, we were always being drawn into life.

subtitles.original: ぬるい美酒との 誘惑祭
subtitles.english: An invitation to a lukewarm fine liquor festival.

subtitles.original: 皆で祝いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's celebrate together.

subtitles.original: 家族も皆 揃ってる
subtitles.english: All our family members are here.

subtitles.original: 骸骨は唄う
subtitles.english: The skeletons are singing.

subtitles.original: 満月が照らす銀の抄
subtitles.english: The full moon illuminates the silver manuscript.

subtitles.original: Halloween Night Party 今宵はお化けが主役さ
subtitles.english: Halloween Night Party, tonight ghosts are the stars.

subtitles.original: シャンパン・ラン・タン・ラン・パン・イ・エ・イ！
subtitles.english: Champagne lantern pan! Yay!

subtitles.original: Halloween Night Party 今宵は踊り明かそうぜ
subtitles.english: Halloween Night Party, let's dance the night away.

subtitles.original: Mummy と Tequila ホッテッテ la la la la la
subtitles.english: Mummy and Tequila, it's hot... la la la la la

subtitles.original: Jack-o'-Lantern
subtitles.english: Jack-o'-Lantern

subtitles.original: 空があくるから 闇の呪文は解けていく
subtitles.english: Since the sky is brightening, the dark spells are dissolving.

subtitles.original: Halloween Night Party 帰らなきゃいけない時間だ
subtitles.english: Halloween Night Party, it's time we must head home.

subtitles.original: 来年もこの場所で会おう
subtitles.english: Let's meet here again next year.

subtitles.original: Halloween Night Party 今宵はお化けが主役さ
subtitles.english: Halloween Night Party, tonight ghosts are the stars.

subtitles.original: お菓子をくれなきゃ襲っちゃえ！
subtitles.english: If you don't give us treats, we'll attack you!

subtitles.original: Halloween Night Party 今宵は踊り狂おうぜ
subtitles.english: Halloween Night Party, tonight let's dance like crazy.

subtitles.original: Witch と 焦がれた筈で la la la la la
subtitles.english: With a witch and the heat of the moment... la la la la la

subtitles.original: Jack-o'-Lantern
subtitles.english: Jack-o'-Lantern

subtitles.original: Mrs. Pumpkinの滑稽な夢
subtitles.english: Mrs. Pumpkin's Comical Dream

subtitles.original: 百から咲いた 触れ行く似顔んですかい
subtitles.english: Is it a portrait bloomed from a hundred that's being touched?

subtitles.original: 何処へ行こうか 愉快に泣いた歌
subtitles.english: Where shall we go? A song that cried out cheerfully.

subtitles.original: ジャックは笑った 異な感情置いといて
subtitles.english: Jack laughed, putting aside his strange emotions.

subtitles.original: チョコレート頂戴 卑せに泣いた歌
subtitles.english: Give me chocolate. A song that cried out in misery.

subtitles.original: 案山子がふらり
subtitles.english: The scarecrow wandered

subtitles.original: むせんで揺れた
subtitles.english: and swayed in the fog.

subtitles.original: 食わず嫌いは カボチャのパイ
subtitles.english: Picky eater's pumpkin pie.

subtitles.original: レララ ルララ 私と踊ろうか
subtitles.english: Lelala lulala, shall we dance?

subtitles.original: まだ眠る お月様
subtitles.english: The moon is still sleeping.

subtitles.original: ほら 紡ぎは何処にもなくなった
subtitles.english: Look, the spinning is gone everywhere.

subtitles.original: つまらないや レララ ハッピーデイ
subtitles.english: How boring. Lelala happy day.

subtitles.original: でっち上げられた 魔法に敏感テトト
subtitles.english: Concocted and sensitive to magic, tetoto.

subtitles.original: 魔女は焦がした 晦冥なようだった
subtitles.english: The witch was scorched, it seemed like darkness.

subtitles.original: ジャックは気取った 卑猥な感情持っといて
subtitles.english: Jack put on airs, keeping his obscene emotions.

subtitles.original: まんまるへ咲いた 腐乱なようだった
subtitles.english: Bloomed into a circle, it seemed like rot.

subtitles.original: 厭きが並みか 企んだ
subtitles.english: Is it the boredom of the waves? I've plotted.

subtitles.original: 電車を待つ
subtitles.english: Waiting for the train.

subtitles.original: 手を繋いだ すま、許された
subtitles.english: Holding hands, sorry, I'm forgiven.

subtitles.original: 巡りつく 果物の中
subtitles.english: Arriving at the destination, inside the fruit.

subtitles.original: ほら 束縛、不乱な...
subtitles.english: Look, restraint, disorder...
